JIPipe Windows Online Installer
-------------------------------

Requirements
------------

1. NSIS (https://nsis.sourceforge.io/Main_Page)
2. Nsisunz plugin (https://nsis.sourceforge.io/Nsisunz_plug-in)
3. Inetc plugin (https://nsis.sourceforge.io/Inetc_plug-in)

Building the installer
----------------------

1. Build JIPipe via mvn package
2. Open jipipe-windows-installer.nsi 
3. Edit the product version if necessary (should be the same as the JIPipe version)
4. Compile the NSI file via the context menu (Windows)
